freemarkerTextToGlueTransformer.freemarkerTemplate: <#list rows as row> <#assign name>${row["Drug"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign category>${row["Drug category"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign subCategory>${row["Drug sub-category"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign generation>${row["Generation"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign wave>${row["Wave"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign companyCode>${row["Company code"]?trim}</#assign> create custom-table-row drug "${name}" custom-table-row drug "${name}" set link-target drug_category custom-table-row/drug_category/${category} <#if subCategory != ""> set link-target drug_sub_category custom-table-row/drug_sub_category/${subCategory} </#if> <#if generation != ""> set field generation ${generation} </#if> <#if wave != ""> set field wave ${wave} </#if> <#if companyCode != ""> set field company_code ${companyCode} </#if> exit </#list>
